abilities.description: A Gear Second-enhanced version of the signature Gomu Gomu no Pistol, combining rubber elasticity with dramatically increased speed.
A Gear Second-enhanced concentrated strike utilizing the increased speed and power of the enhanced form.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
Gear Second puts strain on the user's cardiovascular system

keyMoments.title: Gear Second Activated
keyMoments.description: Luffy activates Gear Second for the second time in his battle against Rob Lucci, pushing the technique to its limits.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the fruit's versatility when combined with Luffy's creative fighting techniques.

keyMoments.title: Jet Pistol Debut
keyMoments.description: First use of Gomu Gomu no Jet Pistol in the Luffy vs. Lucci battle.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases new offensive capabilities when the fruit's powers are combined with Gear Second.

keyMoments.title: Jet Bullet Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Jet Bullet against Lucci, demonstrating another Gear Second technique.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's versatility in adapting multiple techniques to his enhanced form.

notes: In this episode, the fruit's powers are used in conjunction with Gear Second, demonstrating Luffy's growth and mastery of his abilities.

name.japanese: ネコネコの実 モデル:豹
name.romanized: Neko Neko no Mi, Moderu: Reoparudo

abilities.description: Lucci transforms into a human-leopard hybrid, gaining enhanced strength, speed, and predatory instincts.
Lucci combines his Zoan transformation with complete mastery of all six Rokushiki techniques.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone

keyMoments.title: Prepares Ultimate Technique
keyMoments.description: Lucci, in his Zoan form, prepares to demonstrate the most powerful Rokushiki technique, Rokuogan.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the reveal of the ultimate technique that combines his Devil Fruit powers with martial arts mastery.

notes: Lucci uses his Zoan powers in combination with Rokushiki techniques throughout his battle with Luffy in this episode.
